{{c1::Earned Schedule (ES)}} extends EVM to better evaluate schedule performance.
In Earned Schedule theory, schedule variance is calculated as {{c1::ES - AT}}.
A positive value for ES - AT indicates the project is {{c1::ahead of schedule}}.
{{c1::SPI}} using earned schedule is calculated as ES ÷ AT.
Earned Schedule theory can be used to forecast what?
